it.polimi.se2018.model

Class DraftPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.mvc.model.DraftPool

  • public class DraftPool
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the Draft Pool containing all available dice in a turn
    Author:
    Francesco Lorenzo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DraftPool() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToDraftPool(Die die)
      Adds a single die to the Draft Pool Used by ToolCard and by Controller when a player passes
      boolean contains(Die die)
      Checks if a given die is present in the Draft Pool
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object o) 
      void fillDraftPool(java.util.List<Die> draftPool)
      Fills the Draft Pool with a List of dice Used every turn by Controller after extracting dice from the Bag
      java.util.List<Die> getAllDice()
      Returns all the dice currently present in the Draft Pool Used by Controller when a turn ends in order to fill the Round Tracker
      Die getDie(int index)
      Returns the die in the position index from the Draft Pool, which is thought as a linear array going from 0 to its current size Used to handle user input by Controller and by ToolCard
      int hashCode() 
      java.util.List<Die> modelViewCopy()
      Creates a copy of the data structure to be sent to the clients, each die is itself copied Used by Controller
      void removeFromDraftPool(Die die)
      Removes a given die from the Draft Pool Used when you draft by Controller and by ToolCard

    • Method Detail

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Die die)
        Checks if a given die is present in the Draft Pool
        Parameters:
        die - represents the die you want to check if it's present
        Returns:
        true if the Draft Pool contains the given die, false otherwise

      • fillDraftPool

        public void fillDraftPool(java.util.List<Die> draftPool)
        Fills the Draft Pool with a List of dice Used every turn by Controller after extracting dice from the Bag
        Parameters:
        draftPool - is the list to fill the Draft Pool with

      • addToDraftPool

        public void addToDraftPool(Die die)
        Adds a single die to the Draft Pool Used by ToolCard and by Controller when a player passes
        Parameters:
        die - is the die to put in the Draft Pool

      • removeFromDraftPool

        public void removeFromDraftPool(Die die)
                         throws NoDieException
        Removes a given die from the Draft Pool Used when you draft by Controller and by ToolCard
        Parameters:
        die - is the die to remove from the Draft Pool
        Throws:
        NoDieException - if the given die isn't contained in the Draft Pool

      • getDie

        public Die getDie(int index)
           throws NoDieException
        Returns the die in the position index from the Draft Pool, which is thought as a linear array going from 0 to its current size Used to handle user input by Controller and by ToolCard
        Parameters:
        index - is the index of the die you want to get
        Returns:
        the die itself
        Throws:
        NoDieException - if the index points to an invalid position that doesn't contain a die

      • getAllDice

        public java.util.List<Die> getAllDice()
        Returns all the dice currently present in the Draft Pool Used by Controller when a turn ends in order to fill the Round Tracker
        Returns:
        a new ArrayList containing all dice

      • modelViewCopy

        public java.util.List<Die> modelViewCopy()
        Creates a copy of the data structure to be sent to the clients, each die is itself copied Used by Controller
        Returns:
        a List containing all the dice in the Draft Pool
